item.title: Public void
item.dc:creator: @11bravo 11bravo
item.description:
@11bravo wrote:

i tried to add a public void but i get this error

client.java:7866: illegal start of expression
public void glows() {
^

heres what i put in

   public void glows() {

if (adglow == true) { //Admin Glow
stillgfx(197, absY, absX);
}
if (modglow == true) {//PMod Glow
stillgfx(247, absY, absX);
}
if (ownerglow == true) {//Owner Glow
stillgfx(332, absY, absX);
}
}
